question: Mission Purvodaya which is aimed at making Odisha the steel hub of India is a joint venture between the Government of India and which of the following countries?
explanation: Mission Purvodaya (Launched in January 2020) which is aimed at making Odisha the steel hub of India is a joint venture between the Government of India and Japan. Kalinganagar city is selected to make the epicenter of Mission Purvodaya.
